title: Close Out a Matter
description: A case has concluded, and a paralegal needs to perform the administrative steps to close the matter.

tasks.description: Ensure all final time entries have been submitted and the final bill has been sent and paid.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the financial aspects of the matter are complete.

tasks.description: Organize and archive the electronic case file according to firm policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent moves the case file to the firm's long-term archive.

tasks.description: Change the status of the matter to 'Closed' in the case management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The matter is officially marked as closed.
